Key Match Events: Jaren Jackson Jr. scored 14 of the Grizzlies' first 20 points
Desmond Bane poured in 13 second-quarter points
Kevin Durant's slam on a backdoor cut sliced the Grizzlies' lead to 96-95
Bane and Jackson each drained a three on Memphis’s next two possessions to push the lead to 102-97 with 5:55 left
Booker’s trey made it a 108-106 game with 1:51 to go, but the Grizzlies scored the next six points to essentially close it out
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luke Kennard supplied 17 points and seven rebounds off the bench for Memphis
John Konchar pulled down 12 rebounds to go with his seven points
Beal was hurt when he landed awkwardly after being fouled by Jackson with 4:40 left in the opening frame
Phoenix scored the first seven points of the second quarter as Jackson rested on the bench
The Suns rallied in the third quarter by going inside to Plumlee, who threw down four dunks to help bring Phoenix within 74-71
